summary: Andi Mack YouTuber Headcanons (5)
title: Andi Mack YouTuber Headcanons (5)
body:
TJ

-Has a makeup/cosplay channel under TJ K.

-His first video was when he, Buffy and Amber had to do a project on some sort of relationship in literature or the arts.

-They focused on the friendship of Glinda and Elphaba (The GHC are huge fans of Wicked fite me).

-TJ did their makeup, made their costumes, even helped edit and film the video.

-They all got an A for it.

-Amber said that he should do it full time.

-After high school, he did.

-He posted that project video the day after graduation.

-His second video was an introduction, like any YouTuber.

-He helps out with Jonah’s cover videos sometimes.

-He’s talked openly about LGBT rights and as well as talking about any issue that seems relevant.

tags: CAN ANYONE ELSE SEE THIS BECAUSE I CAN
summary:
idk if this is a headcanon or fic but enjoy this concept of Ambi as YouTubers 
when Andi and Amber are upperclassmen in high...
body:
idk if this is a headcanon or fic but enjoy this concept of Ambi as YouTubers

when Andi and Amber are upperclassmen in high school they start YouTube accounts. They both do fashion and lifestyle but Andi focuses more on DIY. And, of course, they collab together most of the time and question why they didn’t just start one channel together. You know there’d be a Q&A video where they answer questions while baking a cake or something and it’s like some rainbow cake and they’re mixing together all the different colors and everything but along the way they eat more of the batter than the actual cake itself.

Somewhere along the way they’d both have coming out videos. Amber’s would be titled something like “Coming Out.” with a dramatic thumbnail of her looking upset or something. And Andi’s would be titled something like “I’m Bi!!!” with her grinning really big in a custom thumbnail complete with cute doodles and editing.

They book random flights for mini trips out to LA and New York. They still live in the small town of Shadyside and they always have an itch to travel together. They don’t label their relationship is yet even though they’re constantly holding hands and cuddling. They fight over the window seat even though most of the time Andi falls asleep on Amber’s shoulder.

They do vlogs during their travels and get more popular and eventually they save up enough money to go to Apulia, Italy!!! They take a leisurely canoe ride (ya know like the one from The Little Mermaid when “Kiss The Girl” is playing) and tell the story of how “3 years ago Amber texted me that she wanted to go here but we never actually thought we’d be here!” Amber would mention how it was the same conversation she tried to call Andi “Big Mack,” and they both share a laugh. Andi asks how she remembers that and amber replies, “I could never forget that conversation.” They’d turn their cameras off and Andi would just be in awe of the scenery with big doe eyes and Amber would be admiring Andi because she looks so incredibly beautiful and happy (like the lantern scene from Tangled). Amber randomly blurts out, “you’re so beautiful,” (which she regularly casually tells Andi). So Andi replies as usual and tells Amber she’s more beautiful. Suddenly, they start one upping each other on who’s more beautiful and they go back and forth telling each other that they’re beautiful. They inch closer each time making sure to keep the canoe balanced until they’re leaning in and no less than a foot apart. They slowly fade out of the “no you’re more beautiful” flirty bickering and silently look into each other’s eyes. “What’s happening?” Andi asks. “We’re making it official,” Amber says as she leans in to kiss Andi as the canoe shakes beneath them but they couldn’t care less if it tips.

BONUS!!!!: they go to a local market in Apulia in search of matching friendship bracelets to remember their trip. Amber finds an anklet but sadly there isn’t a second one. Amber secretly buys it and surprises Andi later with it. Andi then makes an exact replica for Amber because she is the diy queen and girlfriend of the year. They have matching anklets and live happily ever after the end.

summary: Honestly it does suck that such a great representation of what it's like to be a gay teenager is treated this way. Tyrus...
question: Honestly it does suck that such a great representation of what it's like to be a gay teenager is treated this way. Tyrus has/had? such great potential to show a lot of kids they'd eventually find love  just like their straight classmates. It's especially dirty of Disney to let Josh and Luke (it's the poor boys first professional role) take the brunt of fan anger. They love Tyrus as much as us which is honestly so amazing. I'm thankful that they have such as great friendship to support each other
answer:
I mean I really hope people understand and know (esp with the average age of the tumblr fandom) that Luke and Josh are definitely not at fault for whatever happens and should NEVER receive hate over anything that happens with their fictional characters. But they will, of course, and I’m assuming Disney and Terri have done everything they can to help them, and brief them for what could come. Josh for sure knew when he took the role that he would receive hate and have to deal with a lot of angriness (which is why i admire him so much for how active he is with fans) and I’m sure Luke knew too (which is why they casted older actors for these two characters)

They are great people and they do the most which i’m incredibly thankful for and i too am glad that they have such a good friendship and actually enjoy hanging out with each other

summary: I'm reading a million theories rn on the cafeteria scene and episode 7 and I'm just like
body:
I’m reading a million theories rn on the cafeteria scene and episode 7 and I’m just like

This always happens. I always think that a theory makes so much sense and would be soooo amazing but then it never actually happens and I get sad and doubtful.

It’s become a routine

summary: I keep seeing people sharing this picture saying it’s proof there’s going to be a tyrus/jandi scene where they play ping pong...
body:
I keep seeing people sharing this picture saying it’s proof there’s going to be a tyrus/jandi scene where they play ping pong together:

Does anybody know how we know this is a picture from the show and not just the cast playing ping pong in their spare time? I know it’s happening while they’re shooting because of the outfits, but how do we know the ping pong table isn’t just like,in a break room or something and Josh is just playing ping pong?

summary: Am I the only one disappointed that this cast picture was for 2 different storylines? I was expecting some Cyrus / TJ / Buffy /...
caption: Am I the only one disappointed that this cast picture was for 2 different storylines? I was expecting some Cyrus / TJ / Buffy / Jonah / Metcalf interactions. What we got was pretty good, don’t get me wrong, but it would have been fun to have them all in the same storyline.

reblog.comment: Am I the only one disappointed that this cast picture was for 2 different storylines? I was expecting some Cyrus / TJ / Buffy / Jonah / Metcalf interactions. What we got was pretty good, don’t get me wrong, but it would have been fun to have them all in the same storyline.

summary: yo ik i asked this yesterday, and me being the impatient person that I am, im gonna ask it again. when is your new video going...
question: yo ik i asked this yesterday, and me being the impatient person that I am, im gonna ask it again. when is your new video going to be uploaded cause I really enjoy them and also please marry me.   much thanked,                            - Addison ❤️
answer: lmao all good. i just tried exporting it now and an error occurred so im trying again 🙄 and thatll take about an hour and then uploading to youtube will take another hour or 2 so im trying really hard to get it up lmao but things keep going wrong 😅 but ty for your interest im glad you enjoy them!! ❤

blog.name: the-suitelife-of-disneychannel
blog.title: Disney Channel
blog.description: welcome, ya little nasty

summary: hello! i was just wondering what your view is on andi mack and the gay storyline. while i was initially excited im lowkey pissed...
question: hello! i was just wondering what your view is on andi mack and the gay storyline. while i was initially excited im lowkey pissed that there’s barely been any episodes covering the topic and it’s kinda been thrown to the side and makes disney seem pretty sketchy but also fucking grateful for disney to do this so thoughts??
answer:
Andi Mack is great. Although I’m not a fan of Jandi, which is like one of the top storylines because Andi is the titular character, and the slow burn of Cyrus’s storyline, I think it’s a show that can inspire more creators/writers to pitch shows like this to Disney Channel and Disney will green light it. 

Yes, I was one of the many that was excited about the gay storyline. And yes, they pretty much haven’t talked about Cyrus’s sexuality a lot. I think three episodes, out of the entire series so far, Cyrus has a conversation about his crush with Jonah (coming out to Buffy, coming out to Andi, and telling Buffy his crush on Jonah is gone), correct me if I’m wrong. But I guess you can count Bex’s speech to Cyrus about “it’s okay to still figure out who you are” but that was before Cyrus was confirmed gay. When news broke of Cyrus coming out, they were boycotts and Kenya, an entire country, decided to ban the show. So I think Disney wants to be cautious when it comes to LGBTQ content; canon, not “ships”, but actual canon representation. 

For now, I’m just waiting to see if Disney will actually allow Cyrus or anybody really say the word “gay”. Because Disney Channel shows usually last 4 seasons max, and Andi Mack is in its third now, I hope they don’t miss their chance to show more LGBT canon representation. ‘Cause like you said, it is Disney after all, and for them to green light Cyrus as gay from the very beginning of Terri Minsky pitching the show to them, is still pretty great. But again, I, and I bet a lot of people, wanna se more.

tags: buffys p busy w her basketball sideplot so
i doubt she’ll have room to get THAT involved
like I DO WANT THEM TO RESOLVE THEMSELVES
AND MAYBE EVEN AT THE PARK OR SWINGS
but i feel like tj getting buffy’s help
would also be bringing things full circle in a way
summary: Since Cyrus is trying to avoid TJ, I know they’ll probably be in an isolated storyline since all 3 of the GHC have different...
body:
Since Cyrus is trying to avoid TJ, I know they’ll probably be in an isolated storyline since all 3 of the GHC have different plotlines going on but like… does anyone else kinda want TJ to need to ask Buffy for help?

Like I can see her and Andi trying to protect Cyrus from TJ or something but since TJ and Buffy’s relationship has come so far, I kind of want to see TJ begging her to let him talk to Cyrus or to help him get Cyrus to talk to him and her actually.. TRUSTING him and being able to tell how much he cares about Cyrus. It’d show a lot of development for their relationship as well as Tyrus’s.

Idk i just always liked the idea that at some point TJ needed help from Buffy about Cyrus and this would be a cool opportunity? Even though it prob wont happen and I do kind of want to see TJ and Cyrus resolve their conflict on their own because they know eachother well enough to run into eachother and talk about it

tags: tell me what do you guys think
the title is such click bait
summary:
An One Hour Episode?

 So the previous synopsis for “The New Girls” was wrong but i think that it fits 3x8 better, Also I have a...
body:
An One Hour Episode?

So the previous synopsis for “The New Girls” was wrong but i think that it fits 3x8 better, Also I have a wild theory for 3x8. So the synopsis says: “Andi questions her friendship with Buffy; Bex and Bowie are not satisfied by Andi’s decision; after an encouraging talk with Buffy, Cyrus decides to come clean with his friends.”

Seems like this is the episode where Buffy and Andi have a big fight.

Also it sounds like this is the episode where Andi goes to the party with Amber:

But then she makes peace with Buffy?

But also she goes to play ping pong with Cyrus, Jonah and TJ?

( I did considered the fact that the cast picture for “Cookie Monster” was for 2 different storylines, but then Jonah would have to be involved in another storyline in this already packed episode, so I still think that the 4 of them will be playing ping pong in this scene)

Without mentioning that she seems to interact with Bex and Bowie as well?

Seems a bit too much for just one episode, Not only Andi is going to interact with the whole cast (except maybe Cece?) and 2 recurring characters, but she will be involved in the A, B and C plots and be in 3 locations on the same episode, using the exact same outfit, they did reuse one of TJ’s hoodies on season 2 but Andi is the protagonist so I doubt they would use the same clothes for her in 2 different episodes. 

Then again I could be wrong and not all the scenes are from this episode, but everything seems to fit.

Also the C plot: “After an encouraging talk with Buffy, Cyrus decides to come clean with his friends” even if it’s something dumb (I hope it isn’t) He is going to hang out with Andi, TJ and Jonah, Buffy is also absent from the ping pong game so that means that Andi didn’t invite her and Cyrus invited TJ instead which means that they are already in good terms, and Buffy and Cyrus will have their own scene together, so even if it’s the C plot it sure sounds like it’s going to have a good amount of screentime. 

So my hypothesis is that this will be a one hour special episode. A bit weird considering that is not a half season finale, but then again it could be the last episode of the year, if they decide to take a Christmas and a New Year break.

Maybe I’m just rambling.
